name: FirePainter
description:
Try your best to duplicate an image in FirePainter! You have 30 seconds to beat your opponent and win! Point and shoot on the canvas to start painting and press E to change colors.

Watch the trailer to see the multiplayer experience!

Note: The game currently only supports two players. Grab a friend and simply have them start the game on their device.
